    • Method Detail

      • update

        public SharedState update(SharedState newState)
        Description copied from interface: SharedState
        Called when two states need to be compared. The two states can be fused or one or other can be chosen. The desired output state is passed back from the update method. If the object pointer differs then the object is propogated throughout the system. So two objects are fused, make sure to create a new Object, for the state to be registered as having changed
        Specified by:
        update in interface SharedState
        Overrides:
        update in class StateTsp
        Parameters:
        newState - to compare to
        Returns:
        the final state (original, newState, or new mixture of the two)
